props.name: type
props.docblock:
specifies the type of component.
One of select, textarea, or any valid type for an html input tag.

description.text:
specifies the type of component.
One of select, textarea, or any valid type for an html input tag.

props.name: className
props.docblock: specifies the className in addition to a bootstrap class name.

description.text: specifies the className in addition to a bootstrap class name.

props.name: options
props.docblock: should be used to specify the options of an Input of type select

description.text: should be used to specify the options of an Input of type select
